column4: since when did this channel require registration?  I'm guessing you had spam issues but don't forgot a lot of people come here after installing ubuntu for the first time and xchat automatically takes them here for help
anyway, that's not my question: are there any issues with the 8.04 upgrade from 7.10 (ie. should I just clean install?). I had a lot of trouble with upgrading 7.04 to 7.10
i always back up and install fresh
upgrade's seem to take longer too
